current_step_description: Partially implemented Task 5.1 - Successfully launched backend and frontend servers, verified all API endpoints are functional. Full visual verification with Playwright pending due to MCP access requirements.
next_step_prompt: /other Task 5.1 requires Playwright MCP access for visual verification.
